title: ‘Hamnet’ Composer Max Richter to Receive Berlin Film Festival Camera Honor From  Chloé Zhao
summary: German-born British composer Max Richter, who recently collaborated with Chloé Zhao on her Golden Globe-winning “Hamnet,” will be celebrated by the Berlin Film Festival with its Berlinale Camera award. Richter, whose credits besides “Hamnet” include titles such as “Waltz with Bashir,” “Ad Astra,” “…
